channel.description: Recent content in university on Dominik Rys

item.title: 10 Tips for Getting a First in a Computer Science Dissertation
item.description: Introduction The moment I’ve been waiting for for years has happened recently - I’ve graduated with a First Class degree in Computer Science from the University of Birmingham! During the graduation ceremony (which I’ve been very lucky to get given a pandemic going on) I have also been awarded the Undergraduate Distinguished Dissertation Prize. This has been quite an honour as it came completely unexpected, and it made a lot of the effort that went into writing my dissertation worthwhile.
